modName: Ancient Draugr Armor - UNP Top Model BBP
summary: A light armor that can be crafted using the blacksmith forge. It requires ebony ingots, leather, wood and gold. It has similar stats with dragonscale armor and has a variety of customization options. A war axe and a shield with bleeding damage also included. All items can be improved using the workbench.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401332833.png[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Important information![/b]
The HDT version of the mod requires [b]HDT High Heels System[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][/b]!
Both versions require [b]TBBP Compatible skeleton[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]here[/url][/b]!
Works with any UNP body as long as you fill the requirements above!

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Info:[/b]
A light armor that can be crafted using the blacksmith forge. It requires ebony ingots, leather, wood and gold. It has similar stats with dragonscale armor and has a variety of customization options. A war axe and a shield with bleeding damage also included. All items can be improved using the workbench.
[b]Note:[/b]
This is a skimpy version of the Ancient Nord armor that already exists in game, with new high res textures and a few additions and subtractions :) The weapon and shield also exist in game but were re textured to match the armor. Also all stats are boosted but with equally higher crafting requirements.
I tried to make the armor and weapon as much lore friendly as possible using only materials that visually exist in Skyrim. As for lore friendly high heels hmmm, this is as close as they can get :p

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]

[youtube]BwUQo2HC5zA[/youtube] [youtube]JFzjYBrJLi4[/youtube]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Acquisition:[/b]
All items can be crafted using a blacksmith forge and are under the ebony category.
If you want to skip the crafting part you can type help "ancient draugr" in console for the codes.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Versions:[/b]
1.0 Release

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Optional Downloads:[/b]

- A version that doesn't require HDT but contains only the flat boots.

- German Translation

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]External Downloads:[/b]
CBBE Covertion by Mitosuke:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59081/?]Ancient Draugr Armor - CBBE - HDT BodySlide TBBP by Mitosuke[/url]



[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b][color=#C0504D]Required mods:[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url] for the HDT version.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url] for the TBBP skeleton.
Or the one I'm using and highly recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50301/?]Nakrulz Skeleton Pack[/url] (download under the optional files).
A UNP body based texture like the awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2[/url]
or any of your liking.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Known issues:[/b]
Using HDT Version without HDT High Heels System the game will crash.
If you equip the body armor without a TBBP compatible skeleton the game will crash.
The underwear and boots don't have proper ground objects. Avoid dropping them :)
Due to the many transparencies of the armor, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img]
The armor is bloody by itself anyway :)

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]
a) Automatic by using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder
[b]Important![/b] You can only have one of the two versions installed. If you want to switch between HDT and Non HDT then uninstall the one you are currently using.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Un-installation:[/b]
a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by deleting Ancient Draugr.esp from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folder [b]Ancient Draugr[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/ folders.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Mods used in the screenshots and video:[/b]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel by es2[/url]
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url] heavily modified :3

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b]
Top Model body conversion [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52221/?]UNP Top Model Ancient Nord - Draugr Armor by Chitlin[/url]
Boots model [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP HDT REQUIRED by Beazalbob69[/url]
Helmet Hair [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

Many thanks to:

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda who made all this possible.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866875.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1442736710.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439287909.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1437281401.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1436265048.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67180/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1435216507.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1434516218.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419535175.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1416902361.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1415093656.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866635.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412409808.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58205/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410911872.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-5-1410097182.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?][img]http://static [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413852096.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59035/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413854338.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58648/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1413853478.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59081/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1413853478.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59130/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-4-1413853478.jpg[/img][/url]
